parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to repair or refusal to repair the heater core recall can lead to overheating, engine damage, and potential fires, which can cause accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Heater core failure
overheating
engine damage
potential fires.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The requirement of conditional consent for recall repair can lead to delays or refusal of necessary repairs, which can cause accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Dealership refusal to repair recall without conditional consent
potential damage to dashboard or other components.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the CV joint bolts can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, and potentially resulting in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The CV joint bolts fall out or disconnect while driving
causing a loss of control
vibrations
or unusual noises from the wheel area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front axle can cause loss of control, leading to accidents, and potentially result in serious injury or fatalities.
symptoms: Sudden and unexpected breakage of the front axle
front wheel slides out to the side
loss of control while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball joints can cause the front wheel to slide out to the side, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially result in serious injury or fatalities.
symptoms: Front wheel slides out to the side
loss of control while driving
unusual noises or vibrations from the front axle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing belt can cause the engine to stall or seize, resulting in a loss of power and potentially leading to accidents or engine damage.
symptoms: The engine stalls or stops running
the engine makes a loud noise or grinding sound
the timing belt breaks or snaps
the engine overheats
the vehicle experiences a loss of power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the head gasket can cause the engine to overheat, lose power, and potentially lead to engine damage or failure.
symptoms: The engine overheats
the coolant level drops
the vehicle experiences a loss of power
the engine makes a loud noise or grinding sound
white smoke or coolant vapor is visible from the exhaust pipe.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the driver seat frame can cause the seat to become loose or break away, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The driver seat feels loose or unstable
the seat moves excessively while driving
the seat frame is broken or cracked
the seat is no longer securely attached to the vehicle floor.
